article_title: White House responds to ACA ruling
article_text: - White House press secretary Josh Earnest told reporters Tuesday that a federal appeals court ruling would have no "practical impact on [Americans'] ability to receive tax credits" to make health insurance more affordable through Obamacare right now. ()
